tool_description: An API showing all latest/historical Climate Change News  across the world.
name: Climate Change Live and History
title: Climate Change Live and History

api_list.name: Get All Climate Change News
api_list.description: This endpoint returns back all climate change news from across the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-and-history.p.rapidapi.com/news"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-and-history.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News from Individual News Source
api_list.description: Get news about Climate Change from a specific news source.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-and-history.p.rapidapi.com/news/guardian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-and-history.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-live-and-history.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-live-and-history.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
